name: part_005
file: tmp_【３D】ライブも企画も！誕生日祭だーー！！！！【 #大神ミオ誕生日 】 [ChMwx4yeI3g]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Mio and Ayame talk and watch fireworks together before Ayame leaves.
Mio watches the fireworks alone as the scene fades out.
Mio wakes up on a beach, found by Korone, Subaru, and Okayu. They discuss how she ended up there.
The group decides to do a 'suikawari' (watermelon splitting) activity and sets up the rules.
The group performs a chaotic rehearsal of the watermelon splitting.
After the rehearsal success, they prepare for the real attempt by spinning around.

subtitles.original: あー、すごかったよ、あやめちょっと、曲がちょっとジーンときちゃったよ。
subtitles.english: Ah, it was amazing. Ayame got a bit emotional during the song.

subtitles.original: あ、きちゃった？いいね、曲が夏らしい、すご。あやめちゃんと歌えて嬉しかったよ。
subtitles.english: Oh, you did? That's good. The song was very summery, it was great. I was happy to sing with you, Ayame-chan.

subtitles.original: いや、ありがとう、嬉しい！また一緒に歌いたいな。
subtitles.english: No, thank you, I'm happy! I want to sing with you again.

subtitles.original: うん、これからもまた歌おうね。お誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Yeah, let's sing together again. Happy birthday!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！あ、ありがとね。
subtitles.english: Thank you! Ah, thanks.

subtitles.original: うん、気をつけて帰るんだよ。こんなとこまで来ちゃったけど、一人でちょっと頑張って帰ろう。
subtitles.english: Yeah, be careful on your way home. We've come all this way, but I'll try my best to get back by myself.

subtitles.original: あー、なんかちょっと心配になってきちゃった。大丈夫？ちょっと帰ろうかな。
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm getting a little worried. Are you okay? Maybe I should head back too.

subtitles.original: 水上ボートで帰るから、水上ボートで歩いて。バイバイ！
subtitles.english: I'll go back by water boat, walking to the water boat. Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: 頑張ってねミオちゃん！気をつけてねー！
subtitles.english: Good luck Mio-chan! Take care!

subtitles.original: あ、あやめ帰っちゃったな。
subtitles.english: Ah, Ayame's gone home.

subtitles.original: すごい花火だな。
subtitles.english: What amazing fireworks.

subtitles.original: きれい。
subtitles.english: Beautiful.

subtitles.original: おーい、ミオちゃーん！起きろー！
subtitles.english: Hey, Mio-chan! Wake up!

subtitles.original: ミオちゃーん、起きろー！
subtitles.english: Mio-chan, wake up!

subtitles.original: なんだ、なんかうるさい。
subtitles.english: What... it's noisy.

subtitles.original: 起きろー！起きろー！
subtitles.english: Wake up! Wake up!

subtitles.original: 起きろー！起きろー！起きろー！
subtitles.english: Wake up! Wake up! Wake up!

subtitles.original: 起きろー！起きろー！
subtitles.english: Wake up! Wake up!

subtitles.original: 起きた？起きた？
subtitles.english: Are you awake? Are you awake?

subtitles.original: 起きたけど、な、何何？
subtitles.english: I'm awake, but, what, what?

subtitles.original: おはよー！おはよー！
subtitles.english: Good morning! Good morning!

subtitles.original: みんなどうしたの？なんでこんなとこにいんの？
subtitles.english: What's wrong with everyone? Why are you here?

subtitles.original: え、知らん。
subtitles.english: Eh, I don't know.

subtitles.original: なんかミオちゃんが海に落ちてたから。
subtitles.english: Because Mio-chan was falling in the sea.

subtitles.original: そうだよ、拾ったんだよ、拾ってあげたの。
subtitles.english: That's right, we picked you up. We picked you up for you.

subtitles.original: ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: 生きてた。
subtitles.english: You were alive.

subtitles.original: よかった、死んでたらやばい。何でこんなとこにいたの？
subtitles.english: Good, it would have been bad if you were dead. Why were you here?

subtitles.original: いや、なんか昨日、え？なんか花火を見てて、あやめと一緒に歌ってたような気がするんだよな。
subtitles.english: No, yesterday... eh? I feel like I was watching fireworks and singing with Ayame.

subtitles.original: その後気絶して海に漂ってたってこと！？
subtitles.english: Does that mean you fainted after that and were drifting in the sea!?

subtitles.original: おー、そういうこと？やばいね、それ。なんか化かされたような気持ちだよ。
subtitles.english: Oh, is that it? That's crazy. I feel like I've been bewitched.

subtitles.original: あ, ほら、プレゼント買ってきたの！
subtitles.english: Ah, look, we bought you a present!

subtitles.original: お、プレゼント？いいね。
subtitles.english: Oh, a present? Nice.

subtitles.original: じゃじゃーん！
subtitles.english: Ta-dah!

subtitles.original: 見て見て、スイカ買ってきたよ。
subtitles.english: Look, look, we bought a watermelon.

subtitles.original: スイカ！スイカ！スイカ！スイカ！
subtitles.english: Watermelon! Watermelon! Watermelon! Watermelon!

subtitles.original: 本人を差し置いてめちゃめちゃ喜んでんじゃん。
subtitles.english: You're way more excited than the birthday girl herself.

subtitles.original: 夏だもんね、スイカ。
subtitles.english: It's summer, after all. Watermelon.

subtitles.original: みんなで食べる？
subtitles.english: Shall we all eat it?

subtitles.original: 食べたーい！食べよう！
subtitles.english: We want to eat! Let's eat!

subtitles.original: せっかくだからさ、スイカ割りとかしない？夏の思い出に。
subtitles.english: Since we're here, why don't we do some watermelon splitting? As a summer memory.

subtitles.original: いいね！やろうやろう！
subtitles.english: Great! Let's do it, let's do it!

subtitles.original: 誰が割る？
subtitles.english: Who's going to split it?

subtitles.original: え、あ、そりゃまあ、ちょっと尺がちょっと巻き気味で行かなきゃ。
subtitles.english: Eh, ah, well, we have to keep things moving since we're a bit short on time.

subtitles.original: 尺？
subtitles.english: Time?

subtitles.original: じゃあ4人で同時にいっちゃう！？
subtitles.english: Then, shall we all four go at once!?

subtitles.original: 同時に！？
subtitles.english: At once!?

subtitles.original: 同時に！
subtitles.english: At once!

subtitles.original: おー、なんだこれ！都合のいい棒が、出てきた。
subtitles.english: Oh, what's this! A convenient stick appeared.

subtitles.original: じゃあね、これ4人で目隠しをして、危な、5回回ったと思ったら、スイカ割りに行こう。
subtitles.english: Okay, so the four of us will be blindfolded—watch out—and once we think we've spun around five times, let's go split the watermelon.

subtitles.original: 5回回るの？
subtitles.english: Five times?

subtitles.original: うん。
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: オッケー、やってみたい。じゃあスタート位置からちょっと離れよう。
subtitles.english: Okay, I want to try. Then let's move a bit away from the starting position.

subtitles.original: あ、じゃあ、リハーサルやろうか、リハーサル。
subtitles.english: Ah, then, let's do a rehearsal, a rehearsal.

subtitles.original: うわ、なんか目が見えない！見えない！
subtitles.english: Whoa, I can't see! I can't see!

subtitles.original: ほらね、お前何ずらしてんだよ、ずるいぞ！
subtitles.english: See, why are you shifting it? That's cheating!

subtitles.original: ここでいいの。
subtitles.english: It's fine like this.

subtitles.original: よいしょ、よいしょ。よかったよかった。
subtitles.english: Heave-ho, heave-ho. Good, good.

subtitles.original: くそー！
subtitles.english: Damn it!

subtitles.original: そうじゃないでしょ、準備はいい？
subtitles.english: That's not it, are you ready?

subtitles.original: じゃあちょっと、一回回らずにやってみようか、スイカ割れるかどうか。よーいスタート！リハーサル！
subtitles.english: Then let's try it once without spinning to see if we can split the watermelon. Ready, start! Rehearsal!

subtitles.original: やったー！割れた！
subtitles.english: Yay! It's split!

subtitles.original: すごーい！やったー！
subtitles.english: Amazing! Yay!

subtitles.original: やばい、とんでもない奴がいる。
subtitles.english: Crap, there's a crazy person here.

subtitles.original: なんかやばかったって今、割れてるよ。よかったー。
subtitles.english: That was pretty crazy just now, but it's split. Thank goodness.

subtitles.original: 割れてるっぽい。
subtitles.english: Looks split.

subtitles.original: 割れとるやないかい！
subtitles.english: It's totally split!

subtitles.original: じゃあちょっと、もう一回、じゃあ本番ということで。
subtitles.english: Then, one more time, but this time for real.

subtitles.original: わかった。
subtitles.english: Understood.

subtitles.original: さっきなんかドーンって爆発音がしたぜ。トーマスみたいのが来たよ。
subtitles.english: I heard a booming explosion sound earlier. Something like Thomas came.

subtitles.original: 走り回ってたよね、何だったんだあれ。
subtitles.english: It was running around, what was that?

subtitles.original: じゃあちょっとじゃあみんな、スイカから若干離れた状態で、いきますよ、じゃあ5回回って。
subtitles.english: Okay then everyone, stand a bit away from the watermelon. Here we go, spin five times.

subtitles.original: 5回回ったなと思ったらスタートだからね。はい目瞑って。いきますよ。よーいスタート！
subtitles.english: Once you think you've spun five times, that's the start. Okay, close your eyes. Here we go. Ready, start!
